entry.title: MuSig2 BIP
entry.summary: An email was sent by AdamISZ via Proton Mail secure email to Jonas and bitcoin-dev on May 26th, 2022 at 12:34. In the email, AdamISZ acknowledged a merged PR (pull request) and commented that he is now more comfortable with the contents of the draft on the sticky point regarding pubkeys being repeated. He also thanked Jonas and said that he will follow up on the matter. The PR in question can be found on GitHub at https://github.com/jonasnick/bips/pull/25.
